entry.title: Feeld/servant-sns-webhook
entry.summary:
Utilities to embed a servant server to act as a SNS webhook listener

Servant SNS Webhook

Setting up a feedback loop

  • git clone git@github.com:Feeld/servant-sns-webhook.git
  • cd servant-sns-webhook
  • nix-shell
  • stack test --file-watch
